page.title: 13 The Supernatural Hickleton
page.content: {Hickleton}is the only place with ghostly associations.This is probably because old Lord Halifax used to collect and retell{ghost stories}to his friends,family and the village children.In school we have a{ghost book with{stories}collected by Lord Halifax from all sorts of people.There is supposed to be the{ghost}of a nun in a brown habit who{haunts}Monk Hill. There is however a very old nun called Sister Cecilia who lives in the Sue Ryder Home,she was the headteacher of the village school and she diddn't go back to the convent when she retired in 1951.Her habit is also brown!The ghost of the brown nun is the only ghost who roams around in our area.We think this is very suprising.Usually there are many rumours in villages like this.We have used page 13 because of its{supernatural}connections.
